mods.abstract: Typed invoice for an order placed by Bill Denny for Heritage Posters for 100 two color jumbos (half sheet) announcing Hank Williams at the City Auditorium in Montgomery on June 8, 1943. Receipt indicates agreed price, size, order quantity, shipping location and description of the poster.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
